Generated Narrative: StructureDefinition ext-R5-ResearchStudy.comparisonGroup

NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
Extension 0..*Extension(4.0.1)Defined path through the study for a subject
Slices for extension 1..*ExtensionExtension
Slice: Unordered, Open by value:url
extension:linkId 0..1ExtensionAllows the comparisonGroup for the study and the comparisonGroup for the subject to be linked easily
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-ResearchStudy.comparisonGroup.linkId"
value[x] 0..1idAllows the comparisonGroup for the study and the comparisonGroup for the subject to be linked easily
extension:name 1..1ExtensionLabel for study comparisonGroup
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-ResearchStudy.comparisonGroup.name"
value[x] 1..1stringLabel for study comparisonGroup
extension:type 0..1ExtensionCategorization of study comparisonGroup
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-ResearchStudy.comparisonGroup.type"
value[x] 0..1CodeableConceptCategorization of study comparisonGroup
extension:description 0..1ExtensionShort explanation of study path
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-ResearchStudy.comparisonGroup.description"
value[x] 0..1markdownShort explanation of study path
extension:intendedExposure 0..*ExtensionInterventions or exposures in this comparisonGroup or cohort
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-ResearchStudy.comparisonGroup.intendedExposure"
value[x] 0..1Reference(Cross-version Profile for R5.EvidenceVariable for use in FHIR R4(0.0.1-snapshot-3) | EvidenceVariable)Interventions or exposures in this comparisonGroup or cohort
extension:observedGroup 0..1ExtensionGroup of participants who were enrolled in study comparisonGroup
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-ResearchStudy.comparisonGroup.observedGroup"
value[x] 0..1Reference(Cross-version Profile for R5.Group for use in FHIR R4(0.0.1-snapshot-3) | Group)Group of participants who were enrolled in study comparisonGroup
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-ResearchStudy.comparisonGroup"
value[x] 0..0Value of extension

Documentation for this format

name: ExtensionResearchStudy_ComparisonGroup
title: Cross-version Extension `R5.ResearchStudy.comparisonGroup` for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents the FHIR R5 element `ResearchStudy.comparisonGroup` for use in FHIR R4.
purpose:
This extension is part of the cross-version definitions generated to enable use of the
element `ResearchStudy.comparisonGroup` as defined in FHIR R5
in FHIR R4.

The source element is defined as:
`ResearchStudy.comparisonGroup` 0..* `BackboneElement`

Across FHIR versions, the element set has been mapped as:
*  R5: `ResearchStudy.comparisonGroup` 0..* `BackboneElement`
*  R4B: `ResearchStudy.arm` 0..* `BackboneElement`
*  R4: `ResearchStudy.arm` 0..* `BackboneElement`

Following are the generation technical comments:
Element `ResearchStudy.comparisonGroup` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `ResearchStudy.arm`, but has no comparisons.

element.short: Defined path through the study for a subject
element.definition: Describes an expected event or sequence of events for one of the subjects of a study. E.g. for a living subject: exposure to drug A, wash-out, exposure to drug B, wash-out, follow-up. E.g. for a stability study: {store sample from lot A at 25 degrees for 1 month}, {store sample from lot A at 40 degrees for 1 month}.
element.comment: In many clinical trials this is refered to as the ARM of the study, but such a term is not used in other sorts of trials even when there is a comparison between two or more groups.

Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.definition: Unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.

element.definition: An Extension

element.short: Allows the comparisonGroup for the study and the comparisonGroup for the subject to be linked easily
element.definition: Allows the comparisonGroup for the study and the comparisonGroup for the subject to be linked easily.
element.requirements:
Element `ResearchStudy.comparisonGroup.linkId` is part of an existing definition because parent element `ResearchStudy.comparisonGroup` requires a cross-version extension.
Element `ResearchStudy.comparisonGroup.linkId` has a context of ResearchStudy.arm based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `ResearchStudy`.

element.requirements:
this is necessary for ClinicalTrials.gov use which relates  1 to many interventions to comparisonGroups (aka arms) Element `ResearchStudy.comparisonGroup.intendedExposure` is part of an existing definition because parent element `ResearchStudy.comparisonGroup` requires a cross-version extension.
Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `ResearchStudy.comparisonGroup.intendedExposure` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`.
Element `ResearchStudy.comparisonGroup.intendedExposure` has a context of ResearchStudy.arm based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `ResearchStudy`.
